SENT.plain: Thymic hyperplasia can occur after cytotoxic therapy for various malignancies
The possible cause could be rebound enlargement after initial atrophy caused by these drugs
During the treatment of hematological malignancies this could be a cause of great concern
We report here a case of thymic hyperplasia after chemotherapy for acute myeloid leukemia
Awareness of this unusual side-effect may prevent needless investigation and therapy
